item.description:
Boston IBD Value Investing Group

Following up his presentation to our group in September, Raimondas has teamed up with Austin to have a value investing meeting. If you want to show your support then come to this first meeting! First meetings are where much is decided about what the group is about.

Anyone interested in Warren Buffett or Benjamin Graham-based investing is invited.

We will meet at the entrance doors of MIT's Stata Center at 6:30pm. Specifically, the meeting point is the entrance to Building 32 (also known as the Gates Building) on Main Street and Vassar Street. The entrance doors are shown in the first 7 seconds of this video: http://techtv.mit.edu... . We will then use one of the rooms in the Stata Center. The doors are only accessible with an MIT card, so please arrive on time. Note that the start time is 6:30.

Here's a campus map showing the Stata Center.

Meeting Agenda
  • Introductions
  • Stockpicks and analysis: go through about 5 companies, 10 minutes each, looking at balance sheets and income statements.



It is obvious from the agenda that sources will be shared of balance sheets and income statements.

You are welcome to suggest the tickers for stock picks in your RSVP or at the meeting.
item.name: Boston Value Investing Group
